mapper.sql: select id, enable, create_by as "createBy", create_time as "createTime", update_by as "updateBy", update_time as "updateTime", remark, sort, name, belonging_community as "belongingCommunity", belonging_home as "belongingHome", address, belonging_unit as "belongingUnit", numbering, avatar, nickname, phone, integral, id_number as "idNumber", is_bind as "isBind", openid,user_id as "userId",expertise from report_cadre
mapper.select: select id,phone from report_cadre where enable = 1 and phone = #{phone}

select rc.id,rc.name,rc.phone,au.integral,cc.name as "communityName", u.name as "unitName", hc.name as "homeName", rc.id_number as "idNumber" from report_cadre rc left join all_user au on rc.user_id = au.id left join community_class cc on rc.belonging_community = cc.id left join unit u on rc.belonging_unit = u.id left join home_class hc on rc.belonging_home = hc.id
rc.enable = 1
and rc.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and rc.phone = #{phone}
and rc.id_number like CONCAT('%',#{cid},'%')
ORDER BY rc.update_time DESC
select ifnull(sum(au.remaining_points),0) as "remainingPoints" from report_cadre rc LEFT JOIN all_user au on rc.user_id = au.id where rc.enable = 1 and rc.belonging_community = #{cid}
select ifnull(sum(au.remaining_points),0) as "remainingPoints" from report_cadre rc LEFT JOIN all_user au on rc.user_id = au.id where rc.enable = 1 and rc.belonging_unit = #{uid}

select rc.id,rc.name, rc.belonging_community as "belongingCommunity", rc.belonging_home as "belongingHome", rc.address, rc.belonging_unit as "belongingUnit", rc.phone, rc.id_number as "idNumber", rc.is_bind as "isBind",rc.user_id as "userId",au.avatar,au.nickname, au.integral,au.remaining_points as "remainingPoints" from report_cadre rc LEFT JOIN all_user au ON rc.user_id = au.id
and rc.belonging_unit = #{id}
and rc.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and rc.phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and rc.enable = 1
order by au.remaining_points desc
select count(1) from report_cadre where phone = #{phone} and enable = 1
select id,phone from report_cadre where enable = 1 and belonging_unit = #{unit}
